question: I don't know what the topic is back but my question has to do with my lower leg to the side of my shin (never directly in the front on my shin).  Every now and again at least 2 or 3 times a week I get these shooting/sharp pains in my lower leg on the side near my ankle.  It lasts for about 30 seconds and then goes away.  It's not diabetes, I had that checked since the pain.  What else could it be besides shin splints because everywhere I have read, shin splints is a pain on the shin it self.  Thanks.
title: Sharp Pains
